Reports

The eCommerce reports are the main KPI (key performance indicators). It is a great way to get a snapshot of what is happening in the business, in terms of revenue, conversion rates, transaction volume, average order value month over month and revenue from time to time.

Sales by Vendor

The Sales by Vendor report shows the total sales of products listed by a particular list of Vendors (one or more). This is a good report that indicates, which Vendor is making good sales through the platform. You can either choose to see the total sales by all the Vendors or choose a particular list of Vendors to get the sales report by them. Also, you can specify a date range to know the sales by Vendors, during a period.

Total Sales Report

Total Sales Report is a good report that indicates the total sales during a period, say in a month or three months or last six months. You can also specify a date range and price range to know the sales that has happened within a specified period and within a specified price range.

Settlement

You can get a report on the settlement you have made for different orders of each vendor. You can choose a Vendor, choose a particular date range and also select whether you want to see all the settlements or ones that are settled or ones that are not settled.
